long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avo Genius is a smart record engine which allow users to record end to end test scenarios on any Web Application including Salesforce, Oracle Fusion, Microsoft Dynamic CRM.

Steps to start Avo Genius :-
1) Install the Extension in Chrome Browser.
2) Login to Avo Assure with valid credential.
3) Click on the Avo Genius plugin from the Avo Assure home Page.
4) Enter the required details to Select/Create project and click the Next button.
5) Start recording the test cases to execute the scenario.
6) Navigate the test scenario on Application under test, Avo Genius will create the automation.
